com.xuggle.mediatool
Interface IMediaTool

All Superinterfaces:
IMediaGenerator, IMediaListener
All Known Subinterfaces:
IMediaWriter
All Known Implementing Classes:
MediaToolAdapter
public interface IMediaTool
extends IMediaGenerator, IMediaListener

An IMediaGenerator that does work in reaction to other IMediaGenerator objects. In other words it is both an IMediaGenerator and an IMediaListener, and be be used in media pipelines as a result.

Method Summary
 
Methods inherited from interface com.xuggle.mediatool.IMediaGenerator
addListener, getListeners, removeListener
 
Methods inherited from interface com.xuggle.mediatool.IMediaListener
onAddStream, onAudioSamples, onClose, onCloseCoder, onFlush, onOpen, onOpenCoder, onReadPacket, onVideoPicture, onWriteHeader, onWritePacket, onWriteTrailer
